>The movie The Last Sam=
urai... is it a real part of history or not?

The movie itself is, yes. It =
was released in 2003 and as such, is now part of our history.

The events i=
n the movie? No. Some of the characters and events are VERY LOOSELY based o=
n real history, but 99% of it is Holywood fantasy. Read the book 'The Last =
Samurai: The Life and Battles of Saigo Takamori' by Mark Ravina for the rea=
l history behind the character Katsumoto was based on.

-AngusH
